document.text:
June 7, 2021 
AUSA 
SA 
Det 
prep 
• Discussed schedule for trial prep, mechanics of trial testimony. 
USAO 
will pay for 
to fly up to NY for trial, with her husband and children as support. 
• Since last meeting in January 2021, received $3.5 million award from the Victim 
Compensation Fund run by Epstein's estate. Several hundred thousand dollars of that 
amount was taken out, and ultimately received over $2 million. • used the money 
to buy a new home for her family, a car, to pay off fines to get her license back, and to set 
man account for her children. 
• has had trouble sleeping over the past few months because she has dreams about 
Epstein and is nervous about testifying at trial. U continues to speak with her counselor 
every day and is prescribed medications to help with her mental health and addiction. 
• • believes she lied to about her age when they were dating. She 
believes 
she told that she was 17 years old when she was really younger. [NOTE: 
was not feeling physically well during this interview, so no follow up questions were 
asked about this topic during this meeting. AUSA arranged to meet with later in the 
week when U will hopefully be feeling better.] 
EFTA00019915
